resources.string: Kuʻia hang nei oiai initializing Text--No ka Moi engine
O kekah i Google Play e hoʻouka Text ana i ka Moi engine
Ka hoʻopaʻa \n TTS olelo i Kolewenia
Se vidimo kasneje -- A hui hou
Se vidiva jutri -- A hui hou i ka lā \n āpopo
Počutim se dobro -- I Laki e manao maikai
Dober tek -- Bon ikaika loa ka makemake
Mi lahko pomagaš? -- Hiki iā \n oe ke kōkua iaʻu?
Koliko je to? -- Pehea ka nui o ka ia?
Ne govorim Sloveninan -- Au e i olelo Sloveninan
Rabim zdravnika -- I Pono i kekahi kauka
Nisem iz Slovenije -- I\n m ole mai Slovenia
Kje si? -- No hea mai \n oe?
Moje ime je Peter -- Koʻu inoa o Petero
Kaj ti je ime? -- O wai kou inoa?
Ni za kaj -- Naʻu ka hauʻoli
Ne, hvala -- No, aloha aku oe
Lepo te je bilo srečati -- Maikaʻi Ka launa \n ana me\n oe
To je v redu -- I mea OK
Ena kava, prosim -- One ke kope, \n oluʻolu
Eno pivo prosim -- One pia, \n oluʻolu
Kje je stranišče? -- Where o ka toilette?
Ali mi lahko poveste meni, prosim? -- Hiki oe e haawi mai iaʻu i ka \n ike no, eʻoluʻolu?
Ali mi lahko poveste meni, prosim?
Ena omleta, prosim -- One omelette, \n oluʻolu
Nekateri Golaz prosim -- Kekahi Golaž \n oluʻolu
Ali mi lahko prinese račun, prosim? -- Hiki oe e lawe mai iaʻu i ka bila kanawai, eʻoluʻolu?
Ali mi lahko prinese račun, prosim?
Všeč mi je -- makemae au iā ia
Lahko bi bilo -- Ua hiki e
Sem bil nagrajen z eno sobo -- Aʻu i hopu aku kekahi lumi
Sem bil nagrajen z eno sobo
Se vidiva kmalu! -- A hui hou nō!

 Land wahi

 ikepili helu Office)

 000 (January 1st 2015; Repubalika o Slovenia

 Weather ma Ljubljana (kiʻekiʻena 295 mika) 
 Hottest malama: July, 21 ° C; coldest malama: January, -1 ° C (awelika kela la i keia i kā mākou a me ka palena iki); driest mahina: Ianuari a me February, 75 mm o awelike ii iai; wettest mahina: June, 183 mm o awelike ii iai

 "

"Easy ke kōkua o 
 Slovenia? Aniiei? Ma Central Europe, a mau mokuna Italy, Austria, Hungary a me Croatia. Ua ua wale i kekahi mau hora a holo aku, mai Venice a me Vienna. Slovenia mea hiki wawe ka ole mai a pau kokoke aina, e like me ka mea i maikai alanui a me ka hoino aku i pili ai , a me kela la i keia de Europa kulanakauhale nui loa, no ka mea, ia mea he Hawaiian aupuni, e hiki no hoi kiʻi i Slovenia ma kai. 
 
 By Car 
 Most o na kaa komo Slovenia ma motorways, i mea i ka easiest alanui e hele ana a puni ka aupuni. he oluolu e hele i ka Kolewenia alanui ma ke kaʻa, no ka mea, ua pono, a maopopo signposted.ʻOiai i nā alanui kekahi mea ololi a o Kahualoa Kokohi, he holo holo ia mea akaʻoluʻolu, a pēlā nō, no ka hooikaika a hele aku motorways, ia mea OAXA no oe ia i ka vignette. 
 . 
 By Air 
 In hou i ka kela la i keia de i Europa kulanakauhale nui loa, he mea mau haʻahaʻa-kākiʻauheʻe pūnaewele lele mai i ka papa kuhikuhiE Kolewenia Kailua Jože Pučnik Ljubljana, lakou mau EasyJet a me Wizz Air, lele ana i London, a Palukela. Loa de no Ljubljana e i e ka wale Kolewenia hawaii Aderia Air. E hiki no hoi lele i kekahi o na haole airports ma ke kokoke wahi, a me ke kōkua o Slovenia mai laila aku ma kaʻa 
 ohua, mau ukali a hoolimalima kaʻa. 
 
 By Bus 
 Buses holo i Slovenia mai Europa kulanakauhale nui loa. Ma Slovenia, e hiki no hoi kiʻi i ka hapanui o na kulanakauhale, a me ke kula ma ke kaʻa
 ōhua. Inā e holo ma kūloko alanui, na O Keaukaha ke ana ma ke kaʻa
 ōhua holo ana i loko o kekahi ana. Oe ke kuai i ke kaʻa
 ōhua balota 
 ana mai ke kaʻa
 ōhua Keaukaha, oiai ma nui kaʻa
 ohua aɃe oe ke hoi e kuai i kekahi kaʻa
 ōhua balota no kekahi mau 
 lā. 
 
 By aʻo
 ia 
 Trains i Slovenia holo i kela la, mai Europa kulanakauhale nui loa. Inā e holo ana ma ka huakaʻi, ia mea i hiki ke holo i loko o ka moe kaʻa. Aia mau wale na Loko o Kolewenia aeaciua ai e holo mai ana a puni Slovenia, a me nā mea a pau i ka timetables a me ka kumukuai kahua kaua paʻiʻia ma luna o ka pūnaewele. Oe ke kuai i ka balota ma kela alahao wahi i ku ai, a me ma ka huakaʻi. Kolewenia Loko Ka pili ana i na timetables. 
 
 By Hawaii a Sailboat 
 From May i October, ma laila nō pinepine holo o kiʻekiʻe-māmā mana moku mai Venice, Trieste, Poreč a me Rovinj. Kēlā wā i kēia wā, nui moku peʻa moku hiki i Koper. Inā 
 oe hōʻea me kou mau moku, oe e ike i ka lahui palena: kau akamai nō wale nō i loko o Koper a me Piran, a mai May hiki iʻOkakopa i Izola like pono. Ma Izola, Koper a me Portorož, ma laila nō ke kālā no Marina loaʻa no ka wahi. Ma kekahi mau wahi ma luna o ka Kolewenia kahakai, e hiki ke haehae i ka sailboat. 
 
 By paikikala 
 Naturally, e hiki no hoi kiʻi i Slovenia ma paikikala, ina paha ma ka holo ana i ke alanui a ma ka lawe ana i ka huakaʻi. By paikikala, e hiki kipaku aku ma luna o nā mea a pau i loko o alanui Slovenia. Nā 
 ia wale nō ka expressways a me motorways. Ua ua i hiki ole ke holo i kou paikikala ma ka nahele a me ka mauna
 ūlili. 
 "

"Hiki ke ho
 ākāka 
 ia ma ke aniau ka 
 The aniau o ka Slovenia like typical Europa Hawaiian alakaʻi ai aniau me ka mehana, maloʻo ka luna hoʻomalu a me nā
 ano anu winters, oiai ka Hawaiian like a me na kai ma ka hema i ke Kaiwaenahonua i alakaʻi ai aniau. January o ka coldest mahina me ka ao mahana pele a puni 
 Aʻohe ma ka akau, akā, i loko o kekahi hihia hooilo mahina hiki e loa anu me ka wela loa ma lalo Aʻohe a me ka ikaika, anu northeasterly makani, i kapaia o Hawaii, o ka oi aku ma ka mauna wahi, kahi o ka malie ua ikaika
 ole ma ke kokoke Alpino. kaumaha snowfall a hiki snowstorms e kekahi e hiki i kekahi mau lā ma laila, i ka makahiki awelika helu o ka lā me ka hau ka emi o 40 ma ka haʻahaʻa-aina wahi, a i ka 120 mau lā ma ka mauna wahi o Slovenia ma ka Hawaiian wahi lōʻihi-ka loihi. hau paa paha a me ka hau i loa ke kuka no ka mea, o ka aoao o ka mehana ka wai mahana o ke kai Kaiwaenahonua. 
 
 In kauwela ao mahana hiki 20-25 ° C, akā, somet imes muli o kona kulana kiekie ae, 30 ° C a oi. Ma ka hapanui o ka manawa, ua maloo ka ino me ka lā kupua, eia nae i kekahi manawa, kaumaha Thunderstorms hiki ana ma ka pau ana o ka lā, o ka oi aku ma ka mauna wahi. Lulai o ka koʻu mahina me ka awelika Mahana o 22 ° C. Makahiki kimu loli aʻe mai ka 400 mm o loko o ka hema awāwa mau mea, a me ka mai i ka 1000 mm o loko o ka mauna wahi. 
 
 The map mea maikaʻi loa May-September, ka wā i mahana lā a me ka po i anu, aole ka mea, ua oi ka kupulau ma mua o I ke kau wela. Akuma ka a me ka hooilo mea IeAUPIIe, IAa IO he wahi chilly a me ke kuaua, a pinepine foggy ma ka mauna wahi 
 
 Required aahu:. 
 Lightweight pulupulu a me linens i ke kau mahina; kai mehana o meakino-paona i heavyweights a me rainwear i ka hooilo. A sweater i e pono ai i na ahiahi, a no ka trekking ana ma na mauna, a hiki ma ke kauwela 
 
 Koeppen-Geiger Mea Maluna:. 
 The Climate o Slowenia hiki e hoʻolaha like Cfb Climate; ka pumehana pakiko humid aniau me ka koʻu mahina malalo o 22 ° C ma awelika a me ka eha a oi mahina ma luna o 10 ° C ma average.The aniau o kekahi Hawaiian mau mea o Slovenia hiki e hoʻolaha like Cfa Climate; ka pumehana pakiko Kaiwaenahonua aniau me ka koʻu mahina ma luna o 22 ° C ma luna o kaʻawelike, a humid rula a pau ka makahiki a. 
 . "

"He nui turistic Hawaii i meaʻoluʻolu ia e ike i loko o Slovenia e like me ka Lake kahe, Postojna ana, Triglav National Park, Isonzo ka Motorrail, Piran, Velika Planina, Logar, a he nui
 ē aʻe 
 
 oe ke loaa Slovenia i kekahi mahina o ka makahiki, a e hiki i na ano o ka oo? i loko o ia ka mea uuku country.There e hana e like Paikikala, trekking, piʻi aʻela i luna,ʻeleu aiiia, Spa a me hokele, ana, ano, i ka ai a me ka waina, moʻomeheu, Hawaii, 
 ohana leʻaleʻa, casinos , a no laila, ma luna o 
 
 hōʻoia i ka kēia mau pihi. "

"Lake hookahe \n (Slovene: Blejsko jezero; Kelemānia: Bleder E nānā hoʻi, Veldeser E nānā). O ka loko ma ka Julian Alpino o ke keena Carniolan māhele o northwestern Slovenia, kahi e adjoins ke kulanakauhale o hookahe \n The wahi mea i mākaʻikaʻi , ka loko o 35 ei (22 HI) mai Ljubljana International Airport, a 55 ei (34 HI) mai i ke kulanakauhale nui,, Ljubljana. "

"Postojna Cave 
 (Slovene: Postojnska jama; Kelemānia: Adelsberger Grotte; Italian: Grotte di Aloha Postumia). Mea he 24.340 m + lōʻihi karst ana
 ōnaehana kokoke Postojna, Komohana Hema Slovenia 
 It o ka lua-loihi ana
 ōnaehana i loko o ke aupuni (kēia mau ka Migovec System) [me pono me kekahi o kona luna oo? ecia ioauoa, nā ana i hanaia e ka Pivka muliwai. "

"Triglav National Park (TNP) 
 (Slovene: Triglavski narodni Park) o ka wale National Park ma Slovenia It Ua hoʻokumu 
 ia i loko o kona kēia palapala i ka 1981, a ua aia i loko o ka northwestern hapa o ka aina, niioaaonoaaiii ka southeastern hapa o ka. . Alpine massif 
 Mount Triglav, ka mea kiʻekiʻe loa piko o Julian Alpino, kū kokoke ana ma ka waena o ka National Park mai ia i nā awāwa hohola mai radially, haawi i ka wai i nā nui muliwai nenoai me kā lākou mau kumu i loko o ka Julian Alpino:, ka Soča, a ka Sava, e kahe ana i ka Adriatic, a Black Sea, niioaaonoaaiii "

"Ka Soča (haʻi [soːtʃa] ma Slovene) ole Isonzo (haʻi [izontso] ma Italia) (nā inoa Friulian: Lusinç, Kelemānia: Sontig, Roma: Aesontius a Isontius) o he 138-kilomika o (86 MI) lōʻihi muliwai i kahe ana ma ke komohana Slovenia (96 kilomika 
 ole 60 mile) a me ka northeastern Italy (43 kilomika
 ole 27 mile). 
 an Alpine muliwai ma ka ano, kona kumu wahaheʻe i loko o ka Trenta Valley i loko o ka Julian Alpino ma northwestern Slovenia, ma ka elevation o ka 876 mika (2,874 Ft). [3] ka muliwai, mai holo lākou hala na kulanakauhale o Bovec, Kobarid, Tolmin, Kanal ob Soči, Nova Gorica (kahi mea, ua i kela kapa ma ka Solkan Bridge), a me Gorizia, komo i ka Adriatic kai kokoke i ke kulanakauhale o Monfalcone. he he nival-pluvial? eia i loko o kona keena papa a me pluvial-nival ma kona lalo papa. 
 Prior i ka First World War, ka muliwai i hana hapa o ka palena ma waena o aupuni o Italy, a me ka Austro-Hunakalia aupuni a pau. [mau kuhikuhina pono] i World War i, ka mea, ua i ka loa o ka awaawa kaua ma waena na aina elua, culminat ana i loko o ke kaua o Caporetto i ka 1917 "

"Motorail Loko Ka hana ma ka laina ma waena o Bohinjska Bistrica, Podbrdo a me Most naa Soči, a me ka holo ma ka loihi Kolewenia hoino aku tunnel 
 , aole i makemake e hele i ka hou hele ana ma ke kaʻa me ka loaa ana i kipaku aku i ka loihi? A laila, ho
 āʻo i ka motorail hana , a hāpai i kou kaʻa ana oe hoʻonānea a nanea i ka kaʻaahi holo. 
 Motorail loko ka hana ma ka laina ma waena o Bohinjska Bistrica, Podbrdo a me Most naa Soči, a me ka holo ma ka loihi Kolewenia hoino aku tunnel, ka Bohinj tunnel, ai pili aku luna Carniola ma ka Akau o Slovenia me ke kahakai Littoral i loko o ka South West. Motorail loko ke lawe kaa, vans, pickups, a me ka camper vans i e ole oi 3m i ke kiʻekiʻe a me ka 2.4m i loko o ka laula. "

Ka loa nani kulanakauhale ma ka Kolewenia mokuna la me ke kōkua o ka paakai. Ka Piran paʻakai ipu, kahi o ka honua-papa fleur de Ka sel (pua o ka paakai) ua no hua mai la i keia la me ka hoʻohana 
 makahiki-kahiko ano, ua i ke kumu o ka nani loa Kaiwaenahonua hala kulanakauhale, a me kona ekalesia a me ka manao a me ka nohona Hawaii, kupu. 
 
 Na kahiko awa kulanakauhale me koena o ka medieval paia ua palekana me ka nohona a me ka mōʻaukala kia. Ololi alanui me ka pili loa kūkulu hale e iho mai ana, mai ka mauna a me kona ekalesia i ke kikowaena hale ma luna o ka mokuna wale Ua kuapo kona Kaiwaenahonua külana. He nä Hawaiian kulanakauhale, a hoʻomohala ma lalo o ka aoao o Venice, ua manaoia e lilo kekahi o na kulanakauhale loa pono a me ka loa photogenic ma ka Adriatic kahakai. Ma waho aʻeo ia kuhikuhipuʻuone, ka malina Museum, he aquarium a me nā Hawaii, malihini paapu mai i keia kulanakauhale, eʻai hanana, i ka mōhai ana, a kokoke i na mea maoli hiʻona. 
 
 Piran o kekahi o ka nani loa medieval kulanakauhale o Slovenia. Tricks o kūlana pale pā pōhaku a me nā kuhikuhipuʻuone a me ka moʻomeheu hiʻona, mai ka wa i hala e ke hele i loko o Slovenia no ka hebedoma, hele mai kekahi mōʻaukala kulanakauhale i kekahi, mai ka mokuna a hiki i Ljubljana, a mai ka Alpino a hiki i ka Pannonian Plain. 
 
 Ka Piran Salt ipu, kukulu ai i loko o 804, hoopuni i ka paakai ipu i loko o ka wahi o ka i keia la ka Marina (Lucija, Portorož), ka mea uuku Strunjan Salt nā pā, a me ka nui Sečovlje Salt nā pā. Na mau mea o nā mea a pau i ka malamaia paakai ipu i kēia manawa panorama wahi ulu lāʻau. Ma ka Strunjan Hawaii Park, oe e imi i ka mea hiki ole pali mimiki ma luna o ke kai, a ma ka Sečovlje Salt ipu, oe ke aʻo e pili ana i ka hana kuʻuna paakai? Iecaianoaaiiie me alakaʻi Kauai a me ke kipa i ka Museum o Salt-i. 
 
 kela August, Piran, he kulanakauhale i ulu ma ka paʻakai, kēia ka Saltern Festival e hoala anei lakou i ka hoi ana mai o ka salternʻohana, mai ka Sečovlje saltpans, ma ka mea e pana aku au i kā lākou ka luna hoʻomalu, a hiki i ka hope loa paakai wa e oki ai. I ka papa kuhikuhiE hanana lawe wahi i loko o Tartini Square, a ua hoʻolaʻa i ke Kiure violin virtuoso a me ka haku mele Giuseppe Tartini, hanauia ma Piran. Kela a me keia kauwela, me ka Tartini Festival o ke keena mele i wahi i loko o ke kūlanakauhale. Ke kulanakauhale, kahi e pena hoʻi manawa, a hou i ka waiwai hoʻoulu manaʻo, no hoi e kaumaha ana i ka helu o nā hanana. E hahai i ka lā 
 alemanaka mai o nā hanana ma Piran!

I ka hope o ke kupulau o ka wā o nā cowbells mai ma luna o ka Alpine uliuli o ka Velika Planina plateau hoʻomaka ringing, hai mai i ka hōʻeaʻana mai o nā kahu hipa. O ka ke kilokilo plateau me kekahi o ka mea nui loa kahu ka Luna Hooponopono maʻEulopa. A me āu e kono e aʻo e pili ana i ka mea kupaianaha ola ma luna o ka mauna kula, a Laʻana i ka haleʻuwī waiū liʻiliʻi ka mea, e hoomakaukau no oe. E no ke hele ma na kula a lawe i ka Hike (a mauna Bike) ma ka plateau. 
 
 Velika Planina kono aku me ka nui o ka uku no ka hele ana a me Hikes ma ka mauna kula showcasing maoli a me ka ethnological curiosities ia oe e ole makemake i ka Miss. Ke koho wikiwiki loa ala i Velika Planina mea ma ka uwea kaʻa mai Kamniška Bistrica. Mai laila, e hiki ke lawe i ka Ski ke eaʻe i ka luna, kahi au e ke aloha me ka nani manao. O ka poe i makemake i ke kū
 ē
 ē 
 ana i hiki ke hahai i kekahi o ka luawai-ia footpaths i ka luna. I ka hooilo, aia ka he Ski hene mea, e nonoi aku i ka oiaio ka hooilo poʻe hoʻokalakupua a pau no ka oe e hoomanao, pu me hoaaloha a me ka 
 ohana. 
 
 nā kahu hipa i ka hooponopono ana ma ke kula maupaʻa kekahi 140 pupupu. A me kona ano kuhikuhipuʻuone, ka mea, ke i ka hōʻailona o Velika Planina. e uhi nā pupupu i puhi i ka loina spruce shingles e hiki kokoke i lalo i ka lepo. Ke plateau maoli ke hele mai ola i loko o June, a me ka hōʻeaʻana mai o ka poʻe kahu hipa, ka poe noho ma na pupupu a September me ka mea, e mālama ana i kā lākouʻai na ohana holoholona o. Lakou makemake e wale, ua hauʻoli i kono aku ia nā malihini no ka ho
 āʻoʻana o ko lākou mau homemade haleʻuwī waiū noho lealea ana, a hoi e hoomakaukau i ka pono kahuhipa o ka aina awakea - ka vinega o ka waiu a me ka žganci - buckwheat a me ka huapalaoa e mush. i kekahi o na pupupu i loaʻa ai i nā malihini, no laila, loaʻa kaʻaʻohe kumu oe i hiki ole ke lilo aku i ka po a elua e like me nā kahu hipa hana. 
 
 E ka mokuāhana ma ma ka Capella o Snow Maria, a ili i ke kaulana Vetrnica ana, i mea ole i kekahi wahi paiki hoʻopoepoe footpath. Ma ke komohana kae o ka plateau (Zeleni Rob) loaʻa O kekahi nani loa maoli window kapaia Luknja (puka). Ka Dovja Griča ana (la me ka manao ulu wale pohaku) ua aia i loko o ka Tiha Dolina awāwa (Slovene no ka noho mālie awawa), i mea wale eiwa mika hohonu, akā,ʻikeʻia no ka mea he nui poʻe kaʻao i mea hooeueu ae la i. Kekahi paena kumu kūʻai o ia ike ana o Preskar Museum kahi trnič ua mālama - he kūikawāʻano o ka waiū ano o ka Velika Planina wahi. 
 
 I ke kauwela oe ke koho iho i ma ka plateau me ka pono kahu o ka aina awakea - ka vinega o ka waiu a me ka žganci (buckwheat mush). Nā kahu hipa e e hauʻoli e kaumaha aku oe homemade me ka waiū, a me ka haleʻuwī waiū meaʻai poʻokela pepa ka wā e kipa. Noho ma ka plateau oe ke recharge i kou iuo aaoa? A me nā loina kahu i ka ai, e like me jota (me ka pī, a sauerkraut hotpot), ričet (bale ai:), goulash, sausage me ka sauerkraut, Carniola sausage, buckwheat žganci a olokaa dumplings me ka neoneo ka waiū ikeia like štruklji . 
 
 Under Velika Planina, ma ka waenakonu o pristine ano, oe e wehe ekolu punawai o ka Kamniška Bistrica muliwai. Ka maikai ikeia ana o ia mea ka nui kumu, kahi kokoke i ka mauna e moe ai nā haʻawina V Kamniški Bistrici. I ke kumu 
 oe e loaʻa Plečnik Manor, he hale pupupu papahana ma ke kaulana Kolewenia kanaka kuhikuhi puʻuʻone no laila, e like me ka Blend maoli ai me ka panorama. Oiai Hahai I ka muliwai e mai hoopoina i ke kipa mau gorges: Veliki a me Mali Predaselj, ka narrowest loa o ka Kamniška Bistrica riverbed, a me ka Orglice (Slovene no ka harmonica) wailele mea i pono ke kumukuai ike.

Ka Logar Valley (Logarska dolina) o kekahi o ka loa nani Alpine mauʻaʻei awawa maʻEulopa. Ke harmonic koena ma waena o mooolelo, ke kanaka a me ke ano maoli i loaʻa kona hale ma keia hapa o ka Solčava nui māhele
 āina o nā kāʻeʻaʻeʻa a me ka pilikia i loaʻa. E i kou noho ana ma keia maluhia panorama Hawaii i manawa no ka Hiking, Paikikala, luna o ka lio ana a ka Hawaii photo Safari. Ka paka i kekahi lanakila 
 o ia i ka hoʻonohonoho
 CIPRA Future ma ka Alpino Achievement no ka holomua hooponopono ana o ka mea i malama ia wahi. 
 
 Ma ka Logar Valley oe ke mahalo pristine uliuli ano ma kela anu u. E lawe i ka Trail ma ka Logar Valley, he ano maoli Ewa, a me ka yoiia? Trail e alakai ma ka kupaianaha nooks a me crannies ma waena o ka unspoilt ano o ka panorama Park. Oe e i ka manawa e ike kekahi, pohihihi keia, a hiki miomio pua? Ueo. Ke awawa Ua ike no hoi no kona nui waterfalls, ka mea kaulana i waena o i mea no ka 90-mika Rinka Falls. 
 
 Inā ia ka hana icai oe oe ma hope o 
 oe ke kau aku i ka mea kokoke kuahiwi, e hele Paikikala, pii i ka mauna a hele aku Hawaii photo holoholona no na holoholona i loko o kā lākou
 āina. nā keiki roaming ka poʻe hoʻokalakupua kaao nahele i E hūnā i nā mea he nui o ko lākou mau punahele poʻe hoʻokalakupua moʻolelo huapalapala. E hele mai hooilo ke awāwa ua oi loa maila ka leo kono i keʻa-aupuni iaoeo e, sledding, ihona pali eu? Iiai a Ski holoholo mākou; a inā 
 oe makemake e mai ia ia, oe oeʻoiaʻiʻo, eʻai pii i ka paʻahau waterfalls. 
 
 Wooden granaries a 
 kašče
 i he integral hapa o ka hoʻoilina moʻomeheu Hawaiʻi -ʻaʻole wale nō i loko o ka Logar Valley, akā, i loko o ka Solčava
 āina, a me nā keʻena ma Savinja Valley. Ka mea, he he paʻa mau hapa o ka mahiʻai ona, e like me ka mea i hoʻohana no ka ho
 āhu nå mea 
 ai, o ka oi aku mānoanoa. Kekahi o ia mea no hoʻohana no kā lākou mau hoa. I ike i ka Home o ka uhane e hee, i ka Logarski Kot hanai bipi wau i ka hale, a me ka Chapel o Kristo ke Alii. 
 
 Ka Logar Valley i kekahi o ekolu awāwa ma ka Solčava Māhele 
 - i kekahi mau ia e
 ike akula nō Robanov Kot a me Matkov Kot. Ka hapa nui o ko Solčava Māhele 
 mau kupa noho ma kiʻekiʻe-mauna aina, i waena o i mea o ka lani kiekie loa-e waiho ana mahiʻai ma Slovenia (Bukovnik, 1.327 m). Pii uphill i ka mauna pupupu a me nā kuahiwi a soar ma luna o ka Logar Valley i loko o ka glider. E kēia maikai 
 ia ka
 okoʻa no ia i kou hou Hawaii.

I ka naau o Maribor, noi ai, o ka hale i ka waina kahiko i loko o ke ao nei. I oi aku 450 makahiki kahiko ka mea, 
 o ka mea wale nō mea kanu kaena kona iho iau - ka Old kumuwaina House. Maribor nā kaua, i ka helu o nā hanana hauʻoli o ka Old kumu waina, e like me ka pahi o ka Old kumu waina, St. Martin ka Day, a me ka Old kumuwaina Festival. Manaoio ia ai ole, o ka Old kumu waina, a hiki i kona mau mele, a me ka na kamaaina i wale kekahi kilo, e e hoolohe mai oe ia. 
 
 Žametovka ole modra kavčina (Bleu de Ka Cologne), hookupaa iho la ia ma ka 400 makahiki o ka makahiki, ua helu ia ma ka Guinness Book o Records like me ka waina kahiko i loko o ke ao nei nō ka hana i ka hua. Ke kumu waina kahiko i kanu ia ma Maribor ma ka pau ana o ka Middle Ages ma ka Turkish kaua. Uaʻike maka i - a ola - na kaua i hookaawale mua ae ma waena o ka poʻe komohewa a me defenders o ke kulanakauhale, no ka mea Old kumuwaina House no i keia la i hookahi hapa o ke kulanakauhale pa. 
 
 E kau mai ma luna o gastronomic hele ana ma ke kulanakauhale o Maribor a me kona nā wahi. Oe ke nanea i ka nuiʻano o Štajerska flavors, a me nā alanui, e alakai oe i ka Old kumuwaina House 
 
 The Old kumu waina, o ka mea wale nō mea kanu a me kona mau iau -. Ka Old kumuwaina House. Once hapa o ke kulanakauhale paia, o ka hale i keia la showcases ke kaulana o waina hooilina, me ka Winery, a me ka waina berena lumi mōhai ka uku nui loa waina mai ka Maribor waina māhele 
 āina. A e hoʻolauleʻa ai i ka Old kumu waina, a me ka Maribor kokoke kaena aku lehulehu nani loa waina alanui a me wineries. 
 
 Me ka hoʻouka o culinary, ka waina a me ka moʻomeheu noho lealea ana keia uku nuiʻahaʻaina hanana hoʻomaka ma October me ka pāpāiʻawa waina ohi ai ana o ka Old kumu waina, a me ka hoopau iho nei me ka ahaaina o St. Martin ma Maribor, o ka nui St. Martin ka Day hookahakaha ma Solowenia. Oe e e hiki ke 
 ike i ka maikaʻi i Kolewenia waina nā hoʻohua, loa ka poe mai ka Štajerska wahi, i ke kaumaha. Fans o nā loina culinary mea nani e e hiki ke Laʻana pono kona mau kīʻaha ma kūloko chefs, a malaila ka hoi ka pīhoihoi moʻomeheu polokalamu e a mea a pau aku ai. 
 
 ka lua-nui loa Kolewenia kulanakauhale Maribor ka haʻaheo wale me ke kumu waina kahiko i loko o ke ao nei, i mea oi ma mua o 400 makahiki. Aia i ekolu waina? Ooia, mai keia kaulana o ka waina "lede" a hiki i ke kula o Maribor a oe e holo i kou paikikala ma luna o lākou. Kanaka maka o ka waina? Ooia ekolu e pili ana i ka hoʻonohonoho 
 Archduke Johann Trail mai Graz a hiki i Maribor. Inā 
 oe i ole kekahi o ka loa hoihoi cyclists, e hiki no hoi holo ka uila paikikala, a holo ma kēia mau alanui.

Ma Slovenia, i kekahi ke ike 
 eha okoa lani a ma ka hookahi lā, mai ke ahiahi, i ka remotest kihi o ka aina e wale ana, elua no hora aku, mai ke kulanakauhale nui, o Ljubljana. Ma ka uliuli naau o Slovenia kou Hawaii hiki mai ka mauna Alpino i ka mālie nani o ka Pannonian papu ma ka hikina. Kaiwaenahonua Slovenia, a me kona Hawaiian mau kauhale, a me ka nani loa Karst, ua kali ana no oe e hoike aku ia i loko o nā mea a pau kona nani. Haha aku i ke kaiāulu hoihoi o nā lāʻau ikiʻai wale o ke kulanakauhale nui,, e makaikai i ka nani o ke 
 ano a me ka moʻomeheu i loko o ka puni. 
 
 oe ke haha ​​aku i ka nani o ka launahele Slovenia like kou malu me ka manao o ka mea kaulana Lake hookahe, a me ka mea aloha Lake Bohinj. Aia mau olalo i nā manawa kūpono no foxmike hana ma waena o ka mea nani loa Alpine kuahiwi a me na awawa apo ma ka Julian Alpino, Triglav National Park, me ka mana a me Kamnik Savinja Alpino, a me ka uliuli Pohorje Mountains. Kekahi poo ia Maribor, i ke kūlanakauhale a me ka mea kahiko grapevine i loko o ke ao nei, ka mea kaulana Holiday mākaʻikaʻi o Kranjska Gora, me ka nani loa aina o Koroška, ​​a hele aku e ike i ka Soča River Valley -ʻaʻohe mea wahi e hele ai, he mea hiki ole ka hoao ana ka nahunahu oe. 
 
 ʻOiai nā kūlanakauhale Kaiwaenahonua o Piran, Izola a me Koper hoʻowalewaleʻia nā malihini me lākou medieval kulanakauhale-oaio? A, Portorož kono aku ia ia me kona icai Hawaii. Salt harvesters hiki ke ike aku ko lāua koʻikoʻi i hana ma ka Sečovlje Salt ipu, a me ka Karst me Postojna Cave, Škocjan ana a me Vilenica ana hoʻolaha i ka loa nani loa lola honua lani a ma ka Honua. Kēia māhele 
 āina i kekahi hale i ke aliʻi Lipizzaner lio. I ka aina o ke kumu waina,-waiwai puʻu o Goriška Brda mea kaulana no kona mea hoowalewale kiʻekiʻe-kbps onaona waina, a me oe e ai ia ma oo? Aina, a me ka wineries. A me kona Ia kini o ka pīhoihoi ho
 āʻo iho au a me makou, i ka Vipava Valley ua haawiia
 ku no hoi ma o ka 
 ihiʻihi Lonely Ka, ke hele guidebook nunui. 
 
 Hawaiian Slovenia mea he aina o akea, kula a me ka ape Landskap, kikonia, ka makani-rattles, lana o nā mea wili, ka hoola ana i wai, ikehu kumu, nani loa ape māla waina, kū hoʻokahi kuʻuna a me ka olelo, a me, ka hapanui importantly, ia ka hale i ka mahana, a hoʻokipa kanaka. Kēia panorama mea waiwai i loko o maoli thermal Spa mea e hoʻoikaika a me ka hou-energize oe. E wehe aʻe i ka friendliness a me ka hoʻokipa o ka oo? Ecia aina, kahi e hiki ai i nā noho lealea ana, a noho i ka pō i loko o ka onaona waina neoneo waena konu o nā māla waina. E relive i ka hala, e hiki kele lehulehu kilohana nā pā kaua. 
 
 Ljubljana a me kona nā wahi kaumaha lākou mau malihini olalo i manawa e pana aku au i kā lākou mau aiiia, makaikai, a me ka loaa. Ka uliuli kapikala ua ike no kela palapala manaʻo hana ma ka
 ōpio nā mea hoʻopukapuka kālā, noiʻi, Artists, nā haumāna, a me nā ipo o nā mea maikaʻi. No kekahi manawa pōkole wanaao ae, mai ke kūlanakauhale aku, e hele i kekahi o ka mea nui lā-huakaʻi, me Ljubljana kaumaha ana i ka poe ola, komo i kekahi mau kokoke Hawaii. Oe hiki kekahi ke komo i ke aupuni o ka mea eleele bea, i loko o na ululaau o ka Kočevsko aina, aʻo e pili ana i ka mooolelo o nā kahu a kipa onaona mōʻaukala kūlanakauhale kākauʻia me UNESCO World hoʻoilina Nā paena.

Piʻi i ka piko. Ma ka wawae paha ma ka Bike. Malu mau Ski kumu i kāu mau keiki. Haha aku i ka adrenaline. Inhale freshness. Ma ka waena o nā ululāʻau, ma luna o ka lio, e hiki mai ana i ka wai, ma ka hoʻokūkū kolepa nui. Kikokiko i ka honua o ka hana Hawaii. 
 
 pana aku au i kou Holiday i loko o ka naʻau o ka mauna Slovenia. Walk ma ka hōʻeuʻeu a untouched ano me 10,000 kilomika o ka ia, a hoonohonoho Hiking
 ūlili. Oe ke koho mai 175 mauna pupupu paha ke lilo i hotel a me nā wahi hoʻomoana, no hikers i ka po. E Hiking a Inhale ka freshness o na kuahiwi. 
 
 ka hōʻeuʻeu Landskap o Slovenia, a me kā lākou mau olalo maoli wahine uʻi, he maikaʻi no i ka paikikalaʻana Holiday. Eia, oe ua ike hoi, e huli Trail a kupono no ka oe, i kou mau hoa, a me kou 
 ohana. Aie i ka aoao o ke Kaiwaenahonua aniau, e hiki ke hele ka paikikalaʻana ma Slovenia Aneane pau ka makahiki e kokoke mai. 
 
 Slovenia mea waiwai i loko o ka wai maoli kumu, a aneane kahea aku no ka hana i 
 ole ma kahi o ka wai. E hoomaha mai oe ia oe iho me ka 
 auʻau i loko o ke kai, o ic ??, na muliwai a ma ka holo aiaiaiia. Ka Moku a me ka nalu ma luna o ka wai, a e ka makani hoʻohuli i kou lauoho. Ana i ku-i hoe ee a hoe i ka moku i ke aniani-akaka wai. Anei oe haha ​​adrenaline naholo kiki mai ai? Ka mahina keʻokeʻo wai rafting, kayaking a canoeing, a wehe aʻe i ka wahine maikai o ka puali ololi gorges. E hoʻonānea, hele lawaiʻa a lohi raft ia ka Kolewenia muliwai. 
 
 anei oe malu kūikawā inā pilikia ka haumāna? I ka kou, e olioli oukou uhane a me kou naau paona. E ka nana aku ma Slovenia, mai ka okoa kuanaʻike. E nānā i ke kuana mai o ka lewa, e hoolohe oukou i ke kani ana oʻana i ka wai, haha ​​aku i ka adrenaline hoʻopilikia. He mea ka ka hoao ana e e hoʻololi i kou aiiia i loko o ka poinaʻole ke ola mau hanana. 
 
 ka hoʻokūkū kolepa o Slovenia mea i waena o ka loa maikai maʻEulopa. Ka mea, ua paʻa lākou i loko o typical Landskap ma ka lihi o ka Pannonian Plain, i waena o nā pā waina a me ka ape puʻu, o lalo Alpine piko mai, a ma ka idyllic karst panorama. Aie i ka pōkole mamao ma loko o Slovenia, e hiki hiki loa no ke kolepa me na newa, mai Ljubljana i loko o hoʻokahi hola. 
 
 Equestrianism a me ka luna o ka lio ana i loko o Slovenia i ke aloha a hiki i ka Lipica i paukūʻia ka mahiʻai, ka cradle o ko ke ao nei-kaulana Lipizzaner lio he kenekulia-kahiko i waha. Lehulehu equestrian-oaio? A, oo? Aina a me ranches kaumaha oe i ka hana ana o Slovenia i loko o ka lio. 
 
 A snowflakes hula i loko o ka lewa, a hana i kekahi mea hooilo panorama, ia ka manawa e i kekahi lealea ma luna o ka hau. Ma waho aʻeo ka maikaʻi-malamaia Ski holo lokahi mai lakou, he nui 
 ē aʻe hooilo hana kali oe ma Slovenia. Kikokiko i ka honua o ka poinaʻole Hawaii ma ka hau a me ka hau.

Explore Slovenia ma Bike. Ke hōʻeuʻeu Landskap o Slovenia, a me kā lākou mau olalo maoli wahine uʻi, he maikaʻi no i ka paikikalaʻana Holiday. 
 
 Eia, oe ua ike hoi, e huli Trail a kupono no ka oe, i kou mau hoa, a me kou 
 ohana. Aie i ka aoao o ke Kaiwaenahonua aniau, e hiki ke hele ka paikikalaʻana ma Slovenia Aneane pau ka makahiki e kokoke mai. 
 
 Hop ma ka paikikala, a lawe i ka holo ma ka
 ūlili ma Slovenia ka loa nui ulu lāʻau, i pii auanei oe i ka nani loa plateau ma Central Slovenia a nanea i ka holo ma hilly Landskap. Oe ke no hoi e makaikai i ke kulanakauhale, na alanui a me kihikihiʻo e kau paikikala.

Ka nui maoli loko ma Slovenia me ka pau ole nā ​​manawa kūpono no foxmike hana. 
 
 Lake Bohinj o Nyos i loko o ka mauʻaʻei awāwa, a ia maupaʻa aneane 100 miliona cubic mika o ka wai - e like me ka elemakule Bohinj
 ōlelo hoʻomakeʻaka: i aku ma mua o ka bākeke ina mea mea nui kupono. Ke steeply io na Lake pa holoi ua kŘpa a smoothly hoʻokino, a i ole lepo mau mea. I ke kau, i ka wela o ka wai e pii ai a hiki i 22 ° C; i ka hooilo, o ka moanawai E pa ahau i kekahi manawa. Waterʻilikai 2 - 3 mika ma hope o ka ua nui. 
 
 Lake ka wai ua hoihoi hou ia ekolu manawa no ka makahiki. I ka papa kuhikuhiE hookupu o ka Savica, a me ka papa kuhikuhiE distributary o ka Sava Bohinjka. More ma mua o ka hapakolu o ka wai kahe i loko o ka moana wai, mai ka Karst wai ma lalo o ka moana wai ili ma ka
 ākau kahakai. Iloko o ka ua nui, ka Karst wai, poha mai me ka Govic pūnāwai ma ka Pršivec hillside. 
 
 Lake Bohinj mea hemolele no ka wai hana a pau ka makahiki a - mai ka 
 auʻau
 ana, waapa ana, makani heʻe nalu, kayaking a canoeing, ka lawaiʻa a me ka luʻu kai 
 ana i loko o kai mehana o mahina, i (kekahi manawa,) a hiki hau skating i loko o ka hooilo. hiki i malihini lawe i ka kupanaha oo? waapa holo ole wale e hele no i ko iala hele ma ke kahakai. Inā hau e hai mai ana i ka koho, e 
 oluʻolu e makaala, e oe hiki wale skate, a hele ma ka hau ma kou mau kuleana. E paipai aku oe i ka e loa makaala lakou!
Spaʻoluʻolu a me ka wai leʻaleʻa

Kolewenia Spa i ka nui loa o foxmike a me ka i loko o ka wai? Anoee no ka holo ana ma nā kau. A, ka mea hoi i lomilomi a me ka pākōlea loko, a me ka loa uʻi wai nā wahi ulu lāʻau me nāʻaoʻao o. Entertainment no na keiki mea i loaʻa. 
 
 a pau thermal ola hokele ma Slovenia i ke kālā no ka 
 auʻau
 loko me ka thermal ka wai a me ke kai enaena i na mea milimili a mahana. Mau loko i? Anoee no hydro lomilomi, whirlpools, a me ko iala hehee wale. Kekahi ola kino hokele a hiki i 
 Olumepika-nui aiaiaiia. 
 
 Spa me ka nui foxmike wai nā wahi ulu lāʻau me ka hookeai wai chutes, he ahonui a me na muliwai, heʻe nalu mau mea, a me ka wahi kāʻeʻaʻeʻaʻaoʻao o hoopii i ka poe i aloha mai ka wai Hawaii poe. Iwaena o lakou mea o ka mua wai kiʻiaka me ka 360-degere loop. 
 
 Inā 
 oe e hele i ka wai ÿauÿau, e hiki nā pae hoʻokō
 ana me ka kumu aʻo, a e hāʻawi iā 
 oe i nā minute o ka leʻaleʻa, a lawe malama i kou ola. Ke Kula Kaiapuni 
 ano o ka wai aerobics a me nā ano o ka hoʻokō
 hoʻoikaika 
 ana i kou holo, ae oe e Exhale maikaʻi, a me ka hoʻoikaika i kou naehana nāʻiʻo. A ka mea makemake e leʻaleʻa. 
 
 Ma hou i loko, Kolewenia Spa no hoi i na mea he nui foxmike sunbathing, ka ai a me ka mea inu mau mea. Kekahi Spa a hiki i sunbathing i alapiʻi no nudists. I ke kau ma ka nui, he mau lehulehu ia lakou i Hawaii na keiki. 
 
 Most Kolewenia Spa i kiddie loko no nā hāʻaweʻia, a aloha loko no nā keiki. Ua piha o Hawaii a me nā moʻolelo e pili ana i kūloko a me ka 
 ē aʻe, nui loa-ike, meʻe Children-aloha lealea. Maikam dwarves a me elves, pirates a Indians! Massages no nā keiki a me nā keiki mālama nō hoʻi i loaʻa.
